Tom Emerson wrote:
>Impossible to say without seeing the crawl log.


It is a default setup except add of a URIRegExp filter.
Seed.txt only add (http://mobile.yahoo.co.jp)

20040907085003065     1   56 dns:mobile.yahoo.co.jp P 
http://mobile.yahoo.co.jp/ text/dns #001 501 - -

20040907085005588    -6   - http://mobile.yahoo.co.jp/ - - no-type
#001 - - 2t

If a URIRegExp filter is not used, it operates normally.
